events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position, and our team will review it shortly to assess your fit.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, given your extensive software development experience.
A recruiter from the engineering team has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to you soon for next steps.
We completed the initial screening call today, and you demonstrated strong technical knowledge and cultural fit.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions; your enthusiasm for the role is very encouraging.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 3 PM UTC with our senior software engineer.
